subject: Apartheid (Policy)
Davis Cup
Tennis
Boycotts
lead_paragraph: In 1974, four South Africans who dreamed of sipping Champagne from the Davis Cup finally had their hands on it, but there would be no celebration.
snippet: In 1974, four South Africans who dreamed of sipping Champagne from the Davis Cup finally had their hands on it, but there would be no celebration.
